hooks.command: [ "$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "main 브랜치에 직접 수정 금지! 새 브랜치를 만들어주세요."}' >&2; exit 2; }
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then cd backend && uv run ruff format "$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then cd frontend && pnpm exec prettier --write "$CLAUDE_TOOL_ARG_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi
